entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 45B35

Jul 23, 14:10 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 23/07/2023 13:15 UTC
End Time : 23/07/2023 13:54 UTC

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

entry.title: [RBX1][Baremetal] - Room rbx_T2/T1

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 23, 06:17 UTC

Jul 23, 05:32 UTC
Update - Start Time : 23/07/2023 03:58 UTC
End Time : 23/07/2023 05:21 UTC
Root cause : Electrical issue.
Since 05:21 UTC, our technical teams resolved the issue . All impacted services on racks T05E05 T05E06 T05E09 T05E10 T05E11 T05E12 T05E31 T05E32 T05E33 T05E34 T05E35 T05E36 T05E37 T05E38 T05E39 are now operational. Our teams are still working on the remaing ones: T05E07 T05E08 and T05E13.

Jul 23, 04:59 UTC
Update - Update : Since 04:47 UTC, on Vrack the following racks T05E05 T05E06 T05E09 T05E10 T05E11 T05E12 T05E31 T05E32 T05E33 T05E34 T05E35 T05E36 T05E37 T05E38 T05E39 are also impacted by the ongoing electrical issue. Our technical teams are working on this incident.

Jul 23, 04:37 UTC
Identified - Start time : 23/07/2023 03:58 UTC
Service impact : Servers are unreachable on these racks
Root cause : Electrical issue
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are still working on the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Jul 23, 04:13 UTC

entry.title: [BHS4 - BHS5 - BHS6][Dedicated servers global infrastructure] - Multiple Racks
entry.content:
Jul 22, 20:27 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 21/07/2023 18:10 UTC
End Time : 21/07/2023 19:07 UTC
Service impact : The servers on these racks ( T04B35, T04C38, T05D25, T04B14, T04B32, T05E06, T05A33, T05B34, T05B27, B702A12, T05D24, T05C03, T05C28, T05E39, T04C35, T05E30, T05D30, T05D26, T05D38, T05C07, T05E24, T05D37, T05G23, T05E23, T05H14, T05B01,T06G27) were unreachable.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on the electrical distribution.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational
Related incident https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/0mjl7mr8xtcj
